Activity: Arrive at work, enjoy a cup of green tea, and reflect on my dreams from the previous night.
Check work email for updates and prioritize tasks.
Resume development of the email channel. Implement the logic to parse email subject lines and body content to pre-populate ticket fields.
Take a short break to read a poem or inspirational quote.
Begin implementation of the phone support channel. Research the integration of a call logging system with the ticketing system. @ITPM-1 @DBA-1 Topic: Server Space for Help Desk System.
Lunch break. Eat lunch while listening to a podcast about psychology or philosophy.
Brainstorm and design the portal for the help desk ticketing system. Focus on creating a clean and organized interface for users to track their tickets and access helpful resources.
Discuss the portal design with @clinlead-1 @rn-1 @rn-2 to gather feedback on usability and accessibility.
Incorporate the feedback from the clinical team and revise the portal design accordingly.
Review the day's progress and update the task list. Reflect on what was achieved and what needs further attention.
Clock out and head home, feeling good about the progress made.
